arguments.name: Telegram Community Intelligence - Vaultoro & Ubuntu Tribe

parameters.jsCode: const communityConfig = { telegramChannels: { vaultoro: ['@vaultoro', '@vaultoro_community', '@gold_crypto_traders'], ubuntuTribe: ['@ubuntu_tribe_official', '@gift_token_community', '@african_crypto'], goldCrypto: ['@goldbackedcrypto', '@digitalgold', '@precious_metals_crypto'], africanCrypto: ['@africa_bitcoin', '@african_fintech', '@crypto_africa'], competitors: ['@paxgold_official', '@tethergold', '@xaut_community'] }, keywords: { primary: ['vaultoro', 'ubuntu tribe', 'utribe', 'gift token', 'gold backed crypto'], secondary: ['digital gold', 'gold tokenization', 'african crypto', 'remittance crypto', 'inflation hedge'], competitors: ['paxg', 'xaut', 'tether gold', 'usdc gold', 'coinbase gold'] }, personas: { goldInvestor: { keywords: ['gold investment', 'store of value', 'hedge inflation'], painPoints: ['storage costs', 'liquidity', 'verification'] }, africaCryptoTrader: { keywords: ['african bitcoin', 'diaspora', 'remittance', 'local currency'], painPoints: ['high fees', 'currency devaluation', 'access to exchanges'] }, diasporaSaver: { keywords: ['send money home', 'family support', 'stable value'], painPoints: ['transfer fees', 'exchange rates', 'reliability'] } }, analysisGoals: ['community sentiment', 'user questions', 'pain points', 'competitor mentions', 'content opportunities'] }; return [{ json: communityConfig }];

const allInputs = $input.all(); const config = allInputs[0]?.json || {}; const telegramData1 = allInputs[1]?.json?.result || []; const telegramData2 = allInputs[2]?.json?.result || []; const twitterData = allInputs[3]?.json || []; const allTelegramMessages = [...telegramData1, ...telegramData2]; const processedMessages = allTelegramMessages.filter(update => update.message && update.message.text).map(update => { const message = update.message; const text = message.text.toLowerCase(); let sentiment = 'neutral'; let userType = 'general'; let relevantKeywords = []; if (text.includes('excited') || text.includes('amazing') || text.includes('üöÄ') || text.includes('üèÜ')) sentiment = 'positive'; else if (text.includes('worried') || text.includes('concerned') || text.includes('problem')) sentiment = 'concerned'; else if (text.includes('confused') || text.includes('help') || text.includes('?')) sentiment = 'curious'; config.keywords.primary.forEach(keyword => { if (text.includes(keyword.toLowerCase())) relevantKeywords.push(keyword); }); if (text.includes('gold') && text.includes('invest')) userType = 'gold_investor'; else if (text.includes('africa') || text.includes('diaspora')) userType = 'african_crypto_trader'; else if (text.includes('remittance') || text.includes('send money')) userType = 'diaspora_saver'; return { text: message.text, sentiment, userType, relevantKeywords, timestamp: new Date(message.date * 1000).toISOString(), chatId: message.chat.id, chatTitle: message.chat.title || 'Private' }; }); const communityData = { timestamp: new Date().toISOString(), sources: { telegram: { totalMessages: processedMessages.length, channels: [...new Set(processedMessages.map(m => m.chatTitle))], messagesByType: processedMessages.reduce((acc, msg) => { acc[msg.userType] = (acc[msg.userType] || 0) + 1; return acc; }, {}), sentimentBreakdown: processedMessages.reduce((acc, msg) => { acc[msg.sentiment] = (acc[msg.sentiment] || 0) + 1; return acc; }, {}) }, twitter: { available: Array.isArray(twitterData) && twitterData.length > 0, count: Array.isArray(twitterData) ? twitterData.length : 0 } }, messages: processedMessages, config: config }; return [{ json: communityData }];

const data = $json; const recentMessages = data.messages.slice(-50); const prompt = `You are a crypto-native AI assistant specialized in Telegram community analysis for gold-backed cryptocurrency platforms. Analyze these community messages: TELEGRAM COMMUNITY DATA: Total Messages: ${data.sources.telegram.totalMessages} Active Channels: ${data.sources.telegram.channels.join(', ')} User Types: ${JSON.stringify(data.sources.telegram.messagesByType, null, 2)} Sentiment Breakdown: ${JSON.stringify(data.sources.telegram.sentimentBreakdown, null, 2)} RECENT MESSAGES SAMPLE: ${JSON.stringify(recentMessages.map(m => ({ text: m.text.substring(0, 200), sentiment: m.sentiment, userType: m.userType, keywords: m.relevantKeywords })), null, 2)} TARGET COMMUNITIES: - Vaultoro: Swiss crypto-to-gold trading platform - Ubuntu Tribe: African gold tokenization (GIFT token) - Focus: Gold investors, African crypto traders, diaspora savers ANALYSIS REQUIREMENTS: Extract insights for marketing team to create content for newsletters, social media, SEO blogs, and podcasts. Provide structured JSON response: { "weeklyTrendsSummary": "2-3 sentences about key community trends and activity", "keyTopics": ["top 5 discussion topics with frequency indicators"], "repeatedQuestions": ["common questions users ask in communities"], "emotionalTone": { "excitement": "percentage and examples from messages", "concern": "percentage and examples", "curiosity": "percentage and examples", "confidence": "percentage and examples" }, "personas": [ { "type": "persona name (gold_investor/african_crypto_trader/diaspora_saver)", "description": "detailed persona description", "painPoints": ["specific pain points mentioned"], "language": "how they communicate in communities", "contentPreferences": "what content they engage with" } ], "competitorMentions": [ { "competitor": "name (PaxG, XAUT, etc.)", "context": "how mentioned in community", "sentiment": "positive/negative/neutral", "frequency": "how often mentioned" } ], "contentIdeas": { "newsletter": ["5 newsletter topics based on community discussions"], "socialPost": ["5 social media posts that would resonate"], "seoBlog": ["5 blog post ideas targeting community pain points"], "podcastEpisode": ["5 podcast topics with potential community guests"] }, "recommendedMessaging": { "tone": "recommended communication tone for each platform", "keyMessages": ["core messages that resonate with community"], "communityEngagement": "how to engage with each persona type", "contentStrategy": "overall content strategy recommendations" }, "telegramSpecific": { "mostActiveChannels": ["channels with highest engagement"], "bestPostingTimes": "when community is most active", "engagementTactics": ["specific tactics for Telegram engagement"] } }`; return [{ json: { prompt, analysisData: data } }];

parameters.jsCode: const aiResponse = $json.choices[0].message.content; let analysis; try { analysis = JSON.parse(aiResponse); } catch (e) { analysis = { error: 'Failed to parse AI response', rawResponse: aiResponse.substring(0, 500) + '...' }; } const report = { reportDate: new Date().toISOString().split('T')[0], reportType: 'Bi-Weekly Telegram Community Intelligence', executiveSummary: analysis.weeklyTrendsSummary || 'Telegram community analysis completed for Vaultoro and Ubuntu Tribe channels.', insights: analysis, platforms: ['Telegram'], focusBrands: ['Vaultoro', 'Ubuntu Tribe'], dataQuality: { messagesAnalyzed: 'Variable based on community activity', channelsMonitored: 'Multiple Telegram channels', timestamp: new Date().toISOString() }, actionableItems: { contentIdeas: analysis.contentIdeas || {}, messaging: analysis.recommendedMessaging || {}, engagement: analysis.telegramSpecific || {} }, setupInstructions: { telegramBot: 'Create bot via @BotFather and add to target channels', channels: 'Add bot to: @vaultoro, @ubuntu_tribe_official, @gift_token_community', apiKey: 'Set TELEGRAM_BOT_TOKEN environment variable' }, nextSteps: [ 'Review content ideas for marketing team', 'Implement Telegram-specific engagement tactics', 'Create persona-targeted content', 'Monitor competitor discussions' ] }; return [{ json: report }];
